director.name: 索莫·甘迪·迪比沙什 Soumyak Kanti DeBiswas

introduction: Inspired by true events and a collection of unpublished poems, ‘The Daughter’ follows Indu in a dystopian Indian town under curfew as she sets out on a difficult journey and grapples with her father’s dying wish.Starring legendary Bollywood actor Naseeruddin Shah and Ira Dubey, Soumyak Kanti DeBiswas’ directorial debut is a deeply personal exploration of the complicated relationship between an alcoholic parent and a child.
